page.title: 09BELLRINGING LT.WALTHAM II
page.content: I am a member of the{Little Waltham {Bellringers.}There are about a dozen members,the youngest being ten and the oldest is in his fifties. We ring on Wednesdays and Sundays plus special occasions like weddings for which we recive Â£2. I ring the second bell of a set of 6.I have been ringing for eight months but I have not as yet been in any competitions.We have an annual striking competition with other churches,this is ringing different methods.We are marked as sound,order and if not clipping' (bells not conecting each other). The bells in my church have inscriptions on them all telling it's own story. Eg.the treble has "Alfred Bowell made me and hung us all." 1935
